name: Afraid
description:
Afraid, is a indie videogame developed in Unreal Engine, with free-to-use assets (which I really appreciate) during the 2020 pandemic.

This idea was born one crazy night running to home.

Without further ado, here's a little preview ....

                                                                                                          Afraid.

The party is over, it's time to go home...

Run through the streets of this great cyberpunk city with alcohol running in your blood...

What is that light?

                      .... will it be safe to touch it?

Why are
            ...things floating?

Becomes the SLUMLORD.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I did creating it.
